author: Laura Strickler and Tim Stelloh and Kelly O'Donnell
title: Federal officials announce new coronavirus rules for nursing homes to boost transparency
description: The federal agency that oversees nursing homes announced new transparency measures on Sunday requiring the disclosure of coronavirus cases to families of patients and public health officials.
content:
The federal agency that oversees nursing homes announced new transparency measures on Sunday requiring the disclosure of coronavirus cases to families of patients and public health officials.
